visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column range chart. The chart should display the temperature variation by month for Vik i Sogn, Norway in 2023. The chart should have a title 'Temperature variation by month', a subtitle with a source link, and categories for each month on the x-axis. The y-axis should be labeled 'Temperature ( °C )'. The chart should include a tooltip showing the temperature in degrees Celsius. The column range bars should have rounded corners and display data labels with the temperature value. The legend should be disabled.

accessibility.description: Image description: A column range chart compares the monthly temperature variations throughout 2023 in Vik i Sogn, Norway. The chart is interactive and displays the temperature range for each month when hovering over the data. The temperature is measured in degrees Celsius on the X-axis and the months are plotted on the Y-axis. The lowest temperature is recorded in March at minus 13.1 Celsius. The lowest range of temperatures is found in September ranging from a low of 9.6 to a high of 23.0 Celsius. The highest temperature is found in June at 28.4 Celsius, and has the highest range of temperatures from 3.1 up to 28.4

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column range chart to visualize the temperature variation by month for Vik i Sogn, Norway in 2023. The chart type is set to 'columnrange' with 'inverted' set to true, which means the x-axis represents months and the y-axis represents temperature. The chart includes a title and subtitle with a source link. The x-axis categories are labeled with month names, and the y-axis is labeled 'Temperature ( °C )'. The tooltip displays the temperature in degrees Celsius. The column range bars have rounded corners and show data labels with the temperature value. The legend is disabled, ensuring a clean and focused visualization.
